trans-unit.source: Represents an error or warning event that occurred during the use of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> or <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en feil eller advarsel hendelsen som oppstod under bruk av en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You typically use MetadataConversionError objects to determine whether classes that extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> have encountered an error or warning condition by checking the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> properties after importing or exporting the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Bruker du vanligvis MetadataConversionError objekter å finne ut om klasser som utvide <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>har oppstått en feil eller advarsel tilstand ved å kontrollere de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A>Egenskaper etter import eller eksport av metadataene.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter.Errors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>

trans-unit.source: Tools can use these error and warning messages to report metadata import and export problems to the user.
trans-unit.target: Verktøy kan bruke disse feil og advarsler rapporterer metadata Importer og Eksporter problemer til brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: By default an error is created.
trans-unit.target: Som standard opprettes en feil.

trans-unit.source: The error or warning message.
trans-unit.target: Feil eller advarsel.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified message and isWarning value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den klasse ved hjelp av den angitte meldingen og isWarning verdi.

trans-unit.source: By default an error is created.
trans-unit.target: Som standard opprettes en feil.

trans-unit.source: The message for the warning or error.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen for advarsel eller feil.

trans-unit.source: Whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is an error or a warning.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref> er en feil eller en advarsel.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> objects have value equality.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om to <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref> objekter har verdien likhet.

trans-unit.source: For details about reference and value equality, see <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om referansen og verdien likhet, kan du se <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object with which this object is compared.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som dette objektet sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> objects have value equality; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis to <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref> objekter har verdien likhet; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that serves as a hash function for a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som fungerer som en hash-funksjon for en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: For details about hash codes, see <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>.</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> for mer informasjon om hash-koder.

trans-unit.source: A value suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som passer for bruk i nummer algoritmer og data strukturer, for eksempel en hash-tabell.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is a warning or an error.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref> er en advarsel eller en feil.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> is to be considered a warning; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref> skal anses som en advarsel; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the error or warning message.
trans-unit.target: Henter feil eller advarsel.

trans-unit.source: The message for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Melding for den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"> </xref>.
